mapper.select: select count(*) cnt from mmso_notice where ${param1} like '%${param2}%' and active = 0
mapper.insert: insert into mmso_notice(title, content, regdate, countno, active, name, critical) value(#{title}, #{content}, sysdate(), 0, 0, '관리자', #{critical})
mapper.update: update mmso_notice set countno = countno+1 where boardno = #{boardno}
